sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react'; import './style2.css' import './style.css' class Pokemons extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { pokemon: [], }; } componentDidMount() { this.fetchListPokemonId() } fetchListPokemonId() { let id; if (localStorage.getItem("id") === "" || localStorage.getItem("id") === null) { id = ""; } else { id = localStorage.getItem("id") } fetch(`http://localhost:4242/pokemons/${id}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(pokemon => this.setState({pokemon})) } back() { localStorage.removeItem("id") document.location.href = "http://localhost:3000" } render() { const pok=this.state; const url = document.location.href; if(url!== "http://localhost:3000/") { document.location.href="http://localhost:3000/" } const {pokemon} = this.state; if(document.getElementById("pokemon-type2")) { if (document.getElementById("pokemon-type2").value === undefined) { document.getElementById("pokemon-type2").style.display = "none"; document.getElementById("tb-pokemon-type2").style.display = "none"; document.getElementById("titre-pokemon-type").style.columnSpan = "1"; } } window.onbeforeunload = function () { localStorage.removeItem("id") document.location.href="http://localhost:3000/" } return (








Type
Type 1 Type 2
{pokemon.type1} {pokemon.type2}
Caractérique
Espece Taille Poids Forme Couleur Bonus
{pokemon.espece} {`${pokemon.taille} m`} {`${pokemon.poids} kg`} {`${pokemon.forme}`} {`${pokemon.couleur}`} {`${pokemon.effortval}`}
Statistique
Ratio Oeuf pas Capture évaluation Exp valeur Exp max
{pokemon.fmratio} {`${pokemon.oeufpas} `} {`${pokemon.captureval}`} {`${pokemon.expval}`} {`${pokemon.expmax}`}
Aptitude
Aptitude n°1 Aptitude n°2 Aptitude n°3
{pokemon.capspe1} {pokemon.capspe2} {pokemon.capspe3}
Groupe
Groupe 1 Groupe 2
{pokemon.groupoeuf1} {pokemon.groupoeuf2}
    {pokemon.attaques.map(pokemo =>
  • Attaques
    Niveau Nom Puissance Precision PP
    {pokemo.niveau} {pokemo.nom} {pokemo.puissance} {pokemo.precision} {pokemo.pp}
    • )}
); } } export default Pokemons;
